title: An Experiment in towns
creator_credit: John Reeve, Anthony Gilkison and Rayant Pictures
brief_description: Shows the reasons why Britain has recently built fifteen towns - to give healthier working conditions, closer proximity to work, and enable “men to lunch in their own homes”. Explains how the planned towns are designed to allow safe play for children and creative leisure for adults. Shows the good design of individual homes.
